Koga Shuko/Unitron:



Unitron activated his wrist comm., being 100 ft from the Ark.
"Koga Shuko," he said into hte comm. system, "It's been done."

<Excellent, Unitron.  I will commence plan Octavian Marcis De-La-Rama>

---

Koga Shuko sat at a console, pressing a series of buttons, chuckling madly.

---

At the bottom of the crate, a bomb activated, not even bothering with a 
countdown timer, exploded.  The power of the bomb was amplified by the fifty 
kilos of liquid energon greatly, expanding the explosion from a normal 30 
foot radius, to an 85 ft radius.
